content.body: so the upshot here is, i think: without field types, the kind of lock-free programming with shared structs will be pretty limited
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: so the upshot here is, i think: without field types, the kind of lock-free programming with shared structs will be pretty limited

content.body: and that's probably fine, because you shouldn't be doing lock-free programming most of the time?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: and that's probably fine, because you shouldn't be doing lock-free programming most of the time?
